title: The Hate
description: can't really get into the bones of this story without giving too much away, and I don't review with spoilers - why ruin the ride for everyone else? All I can say is Oh. My. God....Review of Manhunt (the first short story) by J. Valentino ...What I really enjoyed was the end of the story. I don't want to give it away but suffice it to say that it too is a situation I could see happening, under the right circumstances....Review of the Hate (second short story) by Tracy Riva Two gritty short stories. Manhunt, the murder of the president with a killer twist.The Hate, revenge done right.Try a sample. I guarantee you'll be back for more.
author: S.L. Pierce
